title: Statement of denial
context: ยง425-115 Statement of denial. A partner or other person named as a partner in a filed statement of partnership authority may file a statement of denial stating the name of the partnership and the fact that is being denied, which may include denial of a person&rsquo;s authority or status as a partner. A statement of denial is a limitation on authority as provided in section 425-114(a) and (b). [L 1999, c 284, pt of ยง1]
